word: We must lay hold of the supreme Power, and close our ears to complaint and faultfinding. Crush this inclination, and empty the soul temple of evil-thinking. Let not one unhappy thought remain within. Souls are perishing in their sins. Work to the glory of God.--Letter 372, Dec. 4, 1906, to Elder O. A. Olsen and Dr. D. H. Kress, working in Australia.
